e: ￹`O~ `ma~`tekes~`ay~ `a~ `sata'os~ `ko~ `sapi~`sipasip~ `ni~`~ `Ma~`riya~ `to~ `tireng~ `ni~`~ `Yis~.￺Mary anointed Jesus with expensive perfume.￻馬利亞用高貴的油膏抹在耶穌的身上
￹`Ma~`ta'osay~ `ko~ `fokes~ `nira~.￺His hair is full of hair oil.￻他頭髮有抹髮油

d.f: ￹￺shampoo made from the ashes of straw￻用糯米穗草燒成灰燼後浸泡水中過濾後留下來的水稱 ta'os，昔日阿美族婦女常用這種水洗頭
